languages.text: "Значит, дело в беззаветной отваге и любви к звездам?"

traits.locale_text: "Значит, дело в беззаветной отваге и любви к звездам?"

languages.text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, дело в беззаветной отваге и любви к звездам?"

traits.locale_text: "So it is about unflinching courage and a love of stars?"
"So it is about unflinching courage and a love of stars?"
"So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"
"So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"
"So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"
"So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"

languages.text: « Donc si je comprends bien, vous faites ça parce que vous avez beaucoup de courage et que vous aimez les étoiles ? »
languages.original_text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"

traits.locale_text: « Donc si je comprends bien, vous faites ça parce que vous avez beaucoup de courage et que vous aimez les étoiles ? »

languages.text: «¿Sus motivos son su valor inquebrantable y su amor por las estrellas?».
languages.original_text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sus motivos son su valor inquebrantable y su amor por las estrellas?».

languages.text: 「では、その理由というのは、強い勇気と星をかける愛ということか？」
languages.original_text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"

traits.locale_text: 「では、その理由というのは、強い勇気と星をかける愛ということか？」

languages.text: “也就是说，你想上船是由于你热爱群星，渴望冒险？”
languages.original_text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你想上船是由于你热爱群星，渴望冒险？”

languages.text: "Eure Gründe sind also Euer unerschütterlicher Mut und Eure Liebe zu den Sternen?"
languages.original_text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Gründe sind also Euer unerschütterlicher Mut und Eure Liebe zu den Sternen?"

languages.text: "Yani bunu sarsılmaz cesaretin ve yıldızlara olan düşkünlüğün nedeniyle mi istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "So your reasons are your unflinching courage and your love of the stars?"
